original_solution_mapping.L1: He wants to serve 5 hushpuppies to each guest and he is having 20 guests so that's 5*20 = <<5*20=100>>100 hush puppies
original_solution_mapping.L2: He can only cook 10 hushpuppies at a time and he needs to cook 100 hushpuppies so that's 100/10 = <<100/10=10>>10 batches of hushpuppies
original_solution_mapping.L3: Each batch takes 8 minutes to cook and he has 10 batches to cook so it will take him 8*10 = <<8*10=80>>80 minutes

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 1898.
    Returns: the total time it will take to cook all the hushpuppies in minutes.
    """
    # L1
    hushpuppies_per_guest = 5 # each guest will eat 5 hushpuppies
    num_guests = 20 # he is having 20 guests
    total_hushpuppies_needed = hushpuppies_per_guest * num_guests

    # L2
    hushpuppies_per_batch = 10 # He can cook 10 hushpuppies
    num_batches = total_hushpuppies_needed / hushpuppies_per_batch

    # L3
    minutes_per_batch = 8 # 8 minutes
    total_cooking_time_minutes = minutes_per_batch * num_batches

    # FA
    answer = total_cooking_time_minutes
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: He wants to serve {hushpuppies_per_guest} hushpuppies to each guest and he is having {num_guests} guests so that's {hushpuppies_per_guest}*{num_guests} = <<{hushpuppies_per_guest}*{num_guests}={total_hushpuppies_needed}>>{total_hushpuppies_needed} hush puppies

He can only cook {hushpuppies_per_batch} hushpuppies at a time and he needs to cook {total_hushpuppies_needed} hushpuppies so that's {total_hushpuppies_needed}/{hushpuppies_per_batch} = <<{total_hushpuppies_needed}/{hushpuppies_per_batch}={num_batches}>>{num_batches} batches of hushpuppies

Each batch takes {minutes_per_batch} minutes to cook and he has {num_batches} batches to cook so it will take him {minutes_per_batch}*{num_batches} = <<{minutes_per_batch}*{num_batches}={total_cooking_time_minutes}>>{total_cooking_time_minutes} minutes

flawed_nl_reconstruction.L1: He wants to serve 5 hushpuppies to each guest and he is having 20 guests so that's 5*20 = <<5*20=100>>100 hush puppies
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L2: He can only cook 10 hushpuppies at a time and he needs to cook 100 hushpuppies so that's 100/10 = <<100/10=10>>10 batches of hushpuppies
flawed_nl_reconstruction.L3: Each batch takes 100 minutes to cook and he has 10 batches to cook so it will take him 100*10 = <<100*10=1000>>1000 minutes

explanation: Input misrepresentation. The value for 'total_hushpuppies_needed' (100) was used instead of 'minutes_per_batch' (8).
